As a design assistant, I assist the senior designers with their projects.  I select materials for client projects, pick up/return material samples to various design centers and showrooms. I also place, track, and receive orders for projects, create project presentations, organize the sample library and office supplies inventory. I participate in site visits to see the progress of projects.  I also perform some administrative tasks such as answer telephones, attend to visitors, assist staff in organizational tasks, create spreadsheets, operate copy and fax machines.As a design assistant I also help stage homes for photo shoots, as well as, participate in designing sets for Colorado's Best.

As a design intern, I assist in picking out materials for client projects, pick up/return material samples to various design centers and showrooms. I also help with creating project presentations, organizing the library and office supplies inventory. I participate in site visits to see the progress of projects.  I also perform some administrative tasks such as answer telephones, attend to visitors, assist staff in organizational tasks, create spreadsheets, operate copy and fax machines.

Cashiers at the Home Depot assist customers during their visit to the store. They help customers with final purchases, operate registers and credit card machines.  Cashiers also answer any questions the customer may have and would complete tasks such as stocking, organizing, and cleaning.  They also ensure that customers enjoy a satisfying shopping experience.

summary: I'm a creative individual with a passion for art and design.  I work hard to achieve my goals and always strive for improvement. As Bruce Lee says,"there are no limits.  There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them".For my undergraduate degree I chose to attend Northern Arizona University and pursue a degree in Interior Design with a minor in Visual Communications. Through my education I gained experience with AutoCAD, Revit, Sketch-Up, Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, and Illustrator.  I graduated summa cum laude in May 2015, where I received a Bachelor of Science in Interior Design with a minor in Visual Communications.  Moving on to the next phase of my life I am eager to continue learning and grow within the industry.  I am a detail and goal-oriented associate, as well as a fast learner.  My goals are to eventually pursue a master's degree and become NCIDQ certified.Digital Portfolio:http://a-hathaway.wix.com/ahdesigns
